data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 524,724 believers in the state of Nampula with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nampula, Mozambique

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Nampula with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Nampula, Mozambique.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Nampula, Mozambique.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Yao, Muslim people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Nampula, Mozambique a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Nampula, Mozambique.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Nampula, Mozambique.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Nampula
location.cities_list: Nampula, Nacala, António Enes, Mozambique, Mutuáli
location.cities_list_w_pop: Nampula (388,526), Nacala (224,795), António Enes (74,624), Mozambique (54,315), Mutuáli (30,523)
